price: 78 poursuivi par Ma malédiction jusqu’au Jour de la rétribution. »
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ لَعۡنَتِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka laʿnatī ilā yawmi al-dīni
